Package game.model

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.model.Card
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EconomicEffect, GetOutOfJail, MoveEffect
    public abstract class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a community chest or a chance card of the Monopoly game. The concrete cards are represented as subtypes of this class.
    Author:
    Ekkart Kindler, ekki@dtu.dk
